author: Meghan Rooney
title: Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen's Hottest PDA Moments
text:
Gisele Bundchen and Tom Brady Sweet Pictures Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen's Hottest PDA Moments February 6, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen's Hottest PDA Moments 
Tom Brady and Gisele Bündchen celebrate their eighth wedding anniversary this month, and the couple is just as in love as ever! If you need proof, just take a look at the power duo's over-the-top PDA. Between their hot makeout sessions on the beach and their sweet moment on the field after the Super Bowl, it's clear they aren't afraid to flaunt their love. Keep reading to see photos of Tom and Gisele in all their envy-inducing glory! 43112039,35936345,18343424
